titleStmt.title: Of Christian magistracy A sermon preach'd in the Cathedral-Church of St. Peter in York, at the assizes held there, July the 26th, 1697. Before the right honourable Mr. Justice Nevill and Baron Turton. By Christopher Wyvill, D.D. and Dean of Ripon.
titleStmt.author: Wyvill, Christopher, 1651?-1711.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for B. Aylmer at the Three Pigeons in Cornhill, and F. Hildyard bookseller in York,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London.
